participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Diligent and responsible, but can be a workaholic. Values organization and reliability.
participant_1.background: If things aren t done right i ll redo them again and again. I take forever to get tasks done so i start early and clock out late. I work too much. I think i need a vacation.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Friendly and sociable, enjoys meeting new people and experiences.
participant_2.background: I have brown hair. I like sleeping. I work at mcdonald s. I write.

content.text: I'm really tired. I've been working so much lately that I'm starting to lose track of time.
I know how you feel. I work at McDonald's, and I'm always so tired when I get home.
I can't imagine working at McDonald's. I'm sure it's really busy all the time.
It is, but it's also really fun. I like meeting all the different people who come in.
I'm sure you do. I like meeting new people too.
What do you do for work?
I'm a security guard. I work long hours, but it's a good job.
It sounds like you have a lot of responsibilities.
I do, but I like it. It keeps me busy.
Me too. I'm not sure what I'd do if I didn't have a job.
I know what you mean. I get bored when I'm not working.
I think I need to take a vacation. I'm going to go to sleep early tonight.
Good idea. I'm going to do the same.
